english.segment1: I used to lay awake at night. Wondering was I wrong or right. I was a prisoner of my fear. Only you
english.segment2: I was a kind of man who'd build a wall. And be the biggest fool of them all. Had a hard time letting go. Till I was broken
english.segment3: Look me in the eyes. Tell me what you see. I'm not the same man. That I used to be
english.segment4: If you see me on my knees. It's not because I'm weak. I'm getting stronger. If you see me start to cry. You'll know the reason why. I'm getting stronger
english.segment5: Well I find myself face to face. In the presence of amazing grace. And I it's all I ever wanted to be. Only you
english.segment6: Look me in the heart. Tell me what you see. I'm not the same man. That I used to be
english.segment7: If you see me on my knees. It's not because I'm weak. I'm getting stronger. If you see me start to cry. You'll know the reason why. I'm getting stronger
english.segment8: If you see me on my knees. Ooh. Ooh. Ooh stronger. Ooh. Ooh. Ooh stronger
english.segment9: If you see me on my knees. It's not because I'm weak. I'm getting stronger. If you see me start to cry. You'll know the reason why. I'm getting stronger
english.segment10: When I get down on my knees. I feel so much power. I'm feeling stronger. So much stronger. Yea
english.segment11: Ooh yea. So much stronger. So much stronger. Ooh. Ooh. Yea. So much stronger. So much stronger. So much stronger. So much stronger.
